item.description:
Mama Kicks is a great band. Join Nancy S. and friends tonight for a fun, enjoyable evening, relaxing and dancing with friends. There is usually a $5 cover charge. Full bar and menu (meal service stops at 10-ish) available inside with an additional bar on the deck. Usually a second musician on the deck. This place fills up quickly so come early. By 9:30, it's hard to find a seat. I will reserve a table, and we can share the chairs we have. The crowd goes from young to "ahem" cultivated. www.derryfieldrestaurant.com
Take Exit 8 off of Rt 93 in Manchester, NH.
Realize the notice is late, but don't you love the spur of the moment? Can't find us? Last minute changes? 603-547-0950 Nancy S. Cell
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a table with Meetup placard. Ask at door.
item.name: Mama Kicks at Derryfield Country Club
